messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Welcome to the SSS, we hope you enjoy your stay crew and follow the law

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: Please turn your suit sensors to maximum. It will allow us to find you when you inevitably get slipped and gored by the lovely Clown employees NT hires. Thanks!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Gateway.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Shit Stain Station's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.
